Usage: yamlinc [option]... <file>

 --watch [executable args...]   Watch file changes during running executable.

 --exec [executable args...]    Launch executable and feed yaml file.

 --strict                       Enable strict mode.
                                Exit if errors occur (exit code 1).

 -o, --output [filename]        Specify output file name.
                                If '-' is supplied, will write to STDOUT.

 --version                      Print software version.

 --help                         Print software man page.

Documentation can be found at https://github.com/javanile/yamlinc
